Class Edge

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
PresentationElement
public class Edge
extends GraphElement

The graphical representation of a transition in a finite state automaton.

Author:
Helen Bretzke

bounds

public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D bounds()
Returns the bounding rectangle with P1 and P2 as vertices. (Assumes for sake of simplicity that the edge is a straight line i.e. ignores control points).

Specified by:
